name: f1-manager
description: Electron application for viewing F1 25 telemetry data in real time.

scripts.dev:electron: cross-env NODE_ENV=development VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 wait-on tcp:5173 && electron -r ts-node/register/transpile-only electron/main.ts
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build:electron
